statements: DELETE FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE property_address = '123 Main St';
DELETE FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE property_id = 101 AND property_value > 500000.00;
DELETE FROM real_estate_market_data WHERE market_trend = 'Increasing' AND property_value < 300000.00;
DELETE FROM market_statistics WHERE neighborhood_id = 5 AND year = 2020;
DELETE FROM market_data WHERE property_id = 100 AND entry_date = '2022-01-01'
DELETE FROM market_statistics WHERE neighborhood_id = 10 AND year < 2020
DELETE FROM market_trends WHERE trend_type = 'Sales' AND start_date < '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM market_statistics WHERE stat_date = '2022-01-01' AND stat_value < 1000;
DELETE FROM property_details WHERE property_size_sqft > 2000 AND property_type = 'Apartment';
